description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Enemies from a faraway galaxy have invaded our beautiful solar system! You are the only one who can repulse these invaders using“Chain Crusher”,last and strongest ship in the fleet. Will you attack quickly and steadily,or get massive points by taking down many enemies at once? Simple to play, but exciting to master! Show your personality on-screen through your play style with"Chain Crusher”.
